testimonials.quote: I finally understand women's health cycles! This knowledge is life-changing.

testimonials.quote: Sarah explains complex women's health topics so clearly. Passed first try!

questions.question: What does women's hormone health primarily focus on?

options.text: Understanding how hormonal imbalances are root causes of fatigue, mood swings, weight changes, and cycle issues in women
Running lab panels and diagnosing conditions

questions.question: As a women's hormone health specialist, your role is to:

options.text: Diagnose hormonal disorders and adjust medications
Educate and support women on nutrition and lifestyle changes that promote hormonal balance
Interpret lab results and prescribe supplements
Replace the client's OB/GYN or endocrinologist

questions.question: In the D.E.P.T.H. Method, what does the "D" stand for?
What is the Warm Market Strategy for finding your first women's hormone health clients?

options.text: List 20 women you know who have mentioned hormonal or cycle-related struggles

questions.question: What is the recommended starter package price for new women's hormone health coaches?

options.text: Free sessions until you feel confident
